name: Basic Slider
description:
Use the arrow keys ⬆⬇⬅➡ to slide.

Learning the ropes with Unity and itch.io.

While I've got big plans for "Slider", it's still in the early phase of game development. The key piece, though, will always be the "Sliding puzzle" or "15 puzzle" as it may be popularly known. The formula is as follows:

"Sliding puzzle" → ❔ →  "Humanity profits" (and myself with it, of course)

—Merwllyra
